questions.question_text: Which feature provides real-time analysis using machine learning (ML) to defend against new and unknown threats?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Anything related to ML needs to have "Advanced" in its name.

Selected Answer: C
C - AURLF does not focus on the dynamic detection of new, unknown threats using machine learning techniques as seen in features like WildFire or DNS Security.
AURLF does not leverage machine learning for real-time detection

Selected Answer: A
A is the answer, has been linked already... it offers ML
B is not even topic of the exam
C has no machine learning, only inline cloud analysis
D is just wrong
I think it's A. D could also work since Palo is all about AI on all of the subs...

Selected Answer: A
A is the correct answer
Answer is A: in addition to the protection offered by PAN-DB, Advanced URL Filtering provides real-time analysis using machine learning (ML) to defend against new and unknown threats.

questions.question_text: What is required to integrate a Palo Alto Networks VM-Series firewall with Azure Orchestration?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
"B" is correct. The rest are outbound-only.

questions.question_text: Which service, when enabled, provides inbound traffic protection?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
Correct answers are A & D
 In an HA configuration on the VM-Series firewalls, both peers must be deployed on the same type of hypervisor, have identical hardware resources (such as CPU cores/network interfaces) assigned to them, and have the set same of licenses/subscriptions.

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/vm-series/11-1/vm-series-deployment/about-the-vm-series-firewall/vm-series-in-high-availability

questions.question_text: Which two criteria are required to deploy VM-Series firewalls in high availability (HA)? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Deployment on same type of hypervisor
choices.A: Assignment of identical licenses and subscriptions

choices.D: It allows extension of Zero Trust Network Security to the most remote locations and smallest branches.
choices.C: It ensures consistent security across the entire environment.
choices.B: It allows for automatic deployment, provisioning, and immediate policy enforcement without any manual intervention.
choices.A: It protects data center and internet gateway deployments.

discussion.content:
C. It ensures consistent security across the entire environment.

Reasons:
Consistent Security: Palo Alto Networksâ€™ CN-Series is designed specifically for Kubernetes environments, where it can enforce security policies consistently across the entire infrastructure. This includes securing traffic between pods and other types of workloads, ensuring that security policies are applied uniformly across all parts of the environment.

Source: Palo Alto Networks CN-Series
Automation and Centralized Management: The CN-Series enables automation of security policy deployment and enforcement without manual intervention, but the biggest advantage is the ability to ensure that all parts of the infrastructure are consistently protected.

Source: Palo Alto Networks CN-Series Overview

Selected Answer: B
Explanation:
https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/cn-series#:~:text=The%20CN%2DSeries%20firewall%20enables,to%20easily%20manage%20CN%2DSeries.

The CN-Series firewall enables network security teams to gain full application (Layer-7) visibility into Kubernetes environments, dynamically scale network security without compromising DevOps agility, and align with the demands of modern DevOps teams to easily manage CN-Series.

questions.question_text: What is a benefit of CN-Series firewalls securing traffic between pods and other workload types?
